/** * Gets the zone handling null. *

* If the zone is null, {@link DateTimeZone#getDefault()} * will be returned. Otherwise, the zone specified is returned. * * @param zone the time zone to use, null means the default zone * @return the time zone, never null */

/** * Get the value as a simple immutable Instant object. *

* This can be useful if you don't trust the implementation * of the interface to be well-behaved, or to get a guaranteed * immutable object. * * @return the value as an Instant object */

     */

     * Gets an instance of the JulianChronology in the default time zone.
     *
